etymology.description: semantic: 广 (“building”) + phonetic: 付 (OC *pos) — a type of building.
etymology.interpretation: 广 cues the idea of a structure or building, while 付 provides the sound and helps form a noun. Their combination points to an official or administrative building, leading to meanings like government office or public institution.

examples.chinese: 我去市政府办事(我去市政府辦事)。
examples.english: I’m going to the city government to handle some business.

examples.chinese: 省府今天发布公告(省府今天發布公告)。
examples.english: The provincial government issued an announcement today.

examples.chinese: 我们参观了旧时的府衙(我們參觀了舊時的府衙)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen cānguān le jiùshí de fǔyá.
examples.english: We toured a historical government office (yamen).
